title: The Daishi Bank
text:
The Daishi Bank lit."The Fourth Bank" is the oldest <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese bank founded in 1873 and located in <a href="Niigata%2C%20Niigata">Niigata</a> city, Chūō.
History.
The bank founder <a href="Shibusawa%20Eiichi">Shibusawa Eiichi</a> was an important Japanese <a href="industrialist">industrialist</a> and for a certain period the bank served as a <a href="national%20bank">national bank</a>.
In October 2008, The Daishi Bank, jointly with <a href="Chiba%20Bank">Chiba Bank</a> and <a href="Hokkoku%20Bank">Hokkoku Bank</a>, hired IBM to build a Call Center System common for the three banks.
References.
"Article contains translated text from on the <a href="Japanese%20Wikipedia">Japanese Wikipedia</a> retrieved on 10 March 2017."
